name: A to Zovya RPG Artist's Tools LoRA
description:
The model this LoRA is extracted from, A to Zovya RPG Artist's Tools (1.5 & 2.1) was created to encompass all things RPG Fantasy Art generation related. From landscapes, ruins, castles to characters and monster concepts. It's designed to assist artist wanting to incorporate AI into their art workflow.

If you'd like to have a smaller file instead of the Checkpoint, you can use this LoRA alongside the base 1.5 model or another of your choice to get a similar style.

Do you have requests? I've been putting in many more hours lately with this. That's my problem, not yours. But if you'd like to tip me, buy me a beer. Beer encourages me to ignore work and make AI models instead. Tip and make a request. I'll give it a shot if I can. Here at Ko-Fi

modelVersions.name: V2 Art
modelVersions.description: May need to turn down the strength to 0.5-0.7 when using on stylized models.

If you'd like to have a smaller file instead of the Checkpoint, you can use this LoRA alongside the base 1.5 model or another of your choice to get a similar style.
